title: Gaming at JAFAX!
content:
Is the hustle and bustle of the convention getting to you? Maybe you have some free time in between panels? Or maybe you just want to kick back and play some games. Whatever your motivation might be our gaming rooms have what you are searching for.

This year, we are excited to have the following options for gaming available:

  • DeadState
  • KDogs Arcade
  • The Tabletop Gaming Library
  • and The Griffin's Rest

To find out more, browse to our gaming events page!
